sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text: This Act may be cited as the Biotechnology Sector Development Act.

sections.heading: Sector program. The Department of Agriculture, in cooperation
sections.text:
with the Department of Commerce and Economic Opportunity, shall establish a
targeted sector program in the area of biotechnology. In fulfillment of this
purpose, the Department of Agriculture is authorized to:

sections.heading: This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
